column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Did Dad send you to talk to me ? "
#Text=Senna says : " Your father does n't know I 'm here .
#Text=" Senna says : " I 've tried , but he wo n't talk about it .
#Text=Honey , it breaks my heart to see our family being torn apart like this .
#Text=" Korra says : " You want to know what 's been going on ?
#Text=I found out Dad 's been lying to me my whole life .
#Text=Unalaq told me everything ; how Dad and Tenzin kept me trapped down here while I trained ; how Dad got banished from the North .
#Text=" Senna says : " So , the truth is out .
#Text=" Korra says : " You knew ?
#Text=And you never said anything .
#Text=" Senna says : " We were trying to keep our family together , to give you a normal childhood .
#Text=" Korra says : " I never wanted a normal childhood .
#Text=All I ever wanted to be was the Avatar .
#Text=But everyone keeps holding me back , even my own parents !
#Text=Unalaq 's the only one who believes in me .
#Text=" Senna says : " That 's not true , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " No ?
#Text=Then why is everyone in the South turning against me , when all I 'm trying to do is help them ?
#Text=" Senna says : " The problems between the North and the South started long before you were born .
#Text=You ca n't expect to undo them in a day .
#Text=" Korra says : " So I should just sit back and let the Water Tribes go to war ?
#Text=" Senna says : " No , but this situation might be out of your control .
#Text=Varrick 's been plotting a rebellion against Unalaq .
#Text=He asked your father to join , and - " Korra says : " Dad is part of a rebellion ?
#Text=" Senna says : " I do n't know , but I do n't want you getting caught in the middle of it .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's too late , Mom .
#Text=I 'm already in the middle of it .
#Text=" Senna says : " Korra !
#Text="
